ComicInfo.Summary: This is the 2003 Dawn Convention sketchbook collection. 28 pages of Dawn in a range of clothes and poses with foreword by Linsner who is in the middle of working on the latest Dawn series: Three Tiers. Linsner's convention sketchbooks are just that.. sketches done at conventions for sale. Most of them are quick and simple and studies of dawn in poses and outfits, with the occasional other character thrown in. This is one for the Dawn / Linsner collectors and those who are interested in ideas of how convention sketching is done.
